history.text: Hello.
Hello!
I remember the first time I saw this movie, I was terrified of the ocean for a long time.
That is hilarious I bet the movie is extremely scary! What is it called?
It is called Jaws.
It is a classic thriller.
Jaws sounds intriguing! Can you tell me more about the movie?
It came out in 1975, and it is about a huge man eating shark.
It was directed by Steven Spielberg and has won critical acclaim among critics of all kinds
Wow! A huge shark! So does the shark go around killing people? Do people avoid the ocean out of fear that the shark will kill them?
Steven Spielberg makes classic movies I'm totally interested in learning more about his movie.
Yes, it starts attacking people in a fictional New England town called Amity Island.
Oh wow! I have never seen a movie with a killer shark before! How giant is this shark? Are we talking Godzilla big?
Not quite.  It is a Great White Shark, but it is on the larger end of the shark spectrum.
After the first attack, the police chief wants to close the beaches, but the mayor doesn't let him because he thinks it will ruin the economy and tourism of the town.

That is totally awesome! You stated that it won some awards? Or was it only nominated
?
Not sure about awards, but it holds a 97% on Rotten Tomatoes and an 87/100 on Metacritics.
Wow how silly is the mayor! He doesn't care about innocent lives!
Not at all!
So then another attack happens and a bounty of $10,000 is put on the shark
That is awesome! 97% is not bad and rotten tomatoes is a reliable source.
I can't believe a bounty is put out on the shark as if it is a common criminal lol I think this movie is going to be interesting to watch for sure!

For sure.  Next what happens
 some fishermen catch a Tiger Shark, so the mayor lets people back on the beaches, thinking the attacks will stop.
But of course they don't!
The Great White comes back and kills a boater.
Not a smart idea! Wow! I can only imagine the level of panic and fear!
Right!
So this local shark hunter named Quint decides to go after the shark.
This shark is evil! Wow I hope they are able to put an end to the shark once and for all!
The way it ends is amazing.
Was Quint successful in killing the shark?
It attacks the boat that the shark hunters were on and ends up killing Quint!  Luckily there are two other guys named Brody and Hooper.
OMG!!! Wow at least Quint was brave enough to at least try.
Brody and Hooper are able to kill the shark?

Yes indeed!  The shark attacks the boat and it starts to sink.  Then Brody shoves a pressurized scuba tank into the shark's open mouth.  Brody grab's Quint's rifle and shoots the tank, which explodes and kills the shark!
It is so tense at the end
Wow! Imagine that shark guts everywhere lol I bet it was an intense ending!
Once the shark is dead, they are able to grab some boat pieces and paddle back to safety.
It is a great movie, so you should definitely watch it!
I'm sure there journey back on land was tiring for sure! I am totally stoked about this movie!
Great!
Well it was a pleasure chatting with you.
Have a wonderful day.
Same and thanks so much for your input!

uid1response.feedback: The other user sounded like he really wants to watch the movie now!

uid2response.feedback: I am interested in the movie and think it is a mixture of humor and fear. Great combinations for me and I'm looking forward to watching the movie.
